[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]New Hack Forums Administration[/color][/b]
[b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] has made the radical decision to express a change of heart and reinstate a former Hack Forums admin as well as appoint two new admins to assist with duties pertaining to the community. As stated in his thread posted earlier this week, the new members appointed to admin are [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=103669]Factor8[/url][/b], [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3021787]Phixel[/url][/b] and [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033]Xerotic[/url][/b]. 

With the new appointments, [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999ff]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] also had this to say:
[quote='Omniscient' pid='56673812']
I hope you all support this decision. It's the best path for us to get things done and move HF forward.  I can no longer function as the only admin of this site. I have limitations with my time, energy, and even my knowledge.  It's best that I get help and I'm comfortable and confident that these 3 will get things done.
[/quote]

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5798755]>>thread[/url][/size]

posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 379

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/2-303.png[/img][/align] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/SupportHFN.png[/img][/align] [align=center]We publish the HF News every week yet we have aged members who don't even know we exist! Wear any of the signatures listed below to support us and spread the word about HF News, HF Wiki, and Writers altogether. [color=white][spoiler=[b]Support Signatures[/b]] [color=white][b]-1-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]http://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]http://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-2-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/VTs6K6A.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/VTs6K6A.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-3-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/hkLhk6f.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/hkLhk6f.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-4-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/ceUBlwQ.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/ceUBlwQ.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-5-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/54dbXHH.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]http://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-6-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/oowqdqM.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/oowqdqM.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-7-[/b][/color] [url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KssvPNL.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=http://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KssvPNL.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [/spoiler][/color][/align] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]Introducing Irradiated Stems Cells Cures Cancer in Mice[/color][/b] Here we have yet another possibly huge breakthrough in cancer treatment. Special cells called Induced pluripotent stem cells, or iPS cells for short, are nothing new to regenerative medicine. They can be coerced into becoming many different types of cells to be used for a wide variety of treatments. A study conducted at Stanford has used these iPS cells to cure cancer in mice successfully. These cells work as a cure because they resemble a cell with developmentally immature progenitor cells. Injecting an iPS cell to replace the cancerous one eliminated the risk of the cells replicating endlessly. The director of the study, Joseph Wu, MD, Ph.D., enthusiastically said “When we immunized an animal with genetically matching iPS cells, the immune system could be primed to reject the development of tumors in the future. Pending replication in humans, our findings indicate these cells may one day serve as a true patient-specific cancer vaccine.” [i][size=x-small][url=http://med.stanford.edu/news/all-news/2018/02/induced-pluripotent-stem-cells-could-serve-as-cancer-vaccine.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Poor Fitness Linked to Brain Deterioration[/color][/b] Scientists at UT Southwestern’s O’Donnell Brain Institute have managed to link an active lifestyle with improved brain function. They suggest that that the lower a person's activity level is, the faster deterioration sets in on the brain. In this study, they mainly focused on dementia specifically. To prove their hypothesis, they focused on the amount of white matter in the brains of their subjects. They specifically sought out Alzheimer's patients and compared the white matter of those who are and aren't physically active. Their findings showed a fairly conclusive link between activity and loss of brain function. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.utsouthwestern.edu/newsroom/articles/year-2018/fitness-dementia.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Liars Seen as Less Competent[/color][/b] This may be something many of you have been doing for years without noticing. Two researchers at Stanford, Jennifer Stellar, Ph.D., and Robb Willer, Ph.D. gathered 1,500 test subjects for this study. In their experiments, the two would show a subject of a person committing a dishonest act such as shoplifting or cheating in a game. The subjects were then asked to rate the people they were shown footage of. People committing dishonest acts were consistently rated lower than those that were not. The authors believe this is because the subjects believed those they were shown to have low "social intelligence." Here is the concept of "social intelligence" explained by Jennifer Stellar, Ph.D. “Social intelligence is often conceived of as the ability to manage complex social situations. It includes characteristics such as taking the others’ perspectives, being adaptable, managing impressions of oneself and adhering to established social norms. A person who is socially intelligent would understand when and why a coworker is angry and effectively manage their coworker’s potentially destructive emotional response.” [i][size=x-small][url=http://thriveworks.com/blog/dishonest-people-viewed-less-capable/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1034038][img]https://i.imgur.com/pnhnIu1.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]Russians Charged for Tampering in 2016 United States Election[/color][/b] On Friday morning, Robert Mueller led the charging of “13 Russians and three Russian companies” for tampering with the election results. Apparently, this was fueled by the “trolling on social media,” Reuters reported. Per the court document, it states that “those accused ‘had a strategic goal to sow discord in the [United States] political system, including the 2016 United States presidential election.’” During the time of this occurrence, it has been confirmed, that the Russians accused, had built online identities that they went by, to further their goal through the course of gathering U.S. intelligence, and staging “political rallies” in 10 states, while they were all posing as Americans. The unexpected indictment, consisting of 30 pages, has the potential to develop further leads or build onto the ongoing Russia-Trump collusion. Additionally, NBC News has released a database of theirs that contains nearly 200,000 tweets that have been linked to Russia and have been flagged as ‘malicious activity’ by Twitter. The recent uncovering only provides more anticipation to the question of, whether or not they will strike again in the U.S. midterm elections. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-indictment/u-s-charges-russians-with-2016-u-s-election-tampering-to-boost-trump-idUSKCN1G022U]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/social-media/now-available-more-200-000-deleted-russian-troll-tweets-n844731?cid=sm_npd_nn_tw_ma]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Nineteen-year-old man Opens fire on Florida School[/color][/b] Nikolas Cruz, the suspect in a school shooting in Broward County, Florida, killed a total of 17 students and faculty, while additionally injuring many others, leaving them in critical condition. Cruz was a former student at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School but faced expulsion “after getting into trouble.” Nikolas was often described as a ‘troubled kid’ after showcasing the animals that he slaughtered, and his collection of weapons, particularly firearms. It was stated that “Mr. Cruz stayed to himself and had few friends but struck fear in some students with erratic behavior and an affinity for violence.” Cruz was not one to go into public without wielding a firearm, which eventually led to his expulsion from the high school, coincidingly. Around the school, it was commonly joked-about, that if someone “were to open fire inside the school, it would be Mr. Cruz.” This image left on Nikolas led to the fearing of him by numerous classmates, the unidentified student said. Earlier in his high school career, he was kicked out for, what one parent said to be due to him having possession of knives on campus. To avoid the death penalty, Cruz is expected to plead guilty. CAUTION: The following video shows footage from inside of the high school at the time of the shooting; it is very graphic, watch at your discretion: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HEKf1qdCFk0 [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nytimes.com/2018/02/14/us/nikolas-cruz-florida-shooting.html]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.sun-sentinel.com/local/broward/parkland/florida-school-shooting/fl-florida-school-shooting-main-20180215-story.html]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Canadian Woman Grabs a Coffee with a Thief[/color][/b] Tess Aboughoushe, a Canadian woman, had an eventful afternoon on Wednesday. As she was headed off from an appointment with her chiropractor, she heard a cry for help from a lady attempting to cross the street. As soon as she heard the scream, “[Aboughoushe’s] instinct kicked in.” Without hesitation, she chased the man for two blocks and found him hiding in an alleyway that she had initially passed. Aboughoushe does not normally train for a scenario such as this, being that she is a long-distance runner, though it seems her training assisted her with the catching of this thief. As she approached the cleanly-shaven man, he “had one hand shoved deep in his pocket.” As Tess feared that he might have had a knife, she then witnessed the man pull an “oversized blue parka” out and began sobbing. The man justified his wrongdoings by stating that his friends from Calgary “left him stranded without money.” Being that the thief had no money and no place to stay, he arrived at his last resort and decided to steal a woman’s wallet. Aboughoushe stated that she did not regret pursuing him, though she had easily put her life at risk. After the encounter and her kind gesture, she provided the man directions on how to reach the library, so that he could “seek out social workers on staff.” Aboughoushe concluded her interview by stating that she did this out of ‘compassion.’ [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/edmonton/edmonton-woman-catches-purse-snatcher-returns-wallet-takes-thief-for-coffee-1.4539143]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2504443][img]https://i.imgur.com/oE7fBvj.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]New Qualcomm LTE Modem chip Acheving 2Gbps Download Speeds[/color][/b] Qualcomm has announced that it had began sampling its new X24 LTE modem which can support download speeds up to 2Gbps. To provide more details, the download speeds of Qualcomm's current X16 LTE modem (used in Snapdragon 835) caps out at 1Gbps. The upcoming X20 LTE modem (as a part of Snapdragon 845) only has download speeds of up to 1.2Gbps. It also boasts a new 7nm process chip, which is the first of its kind on the market. Based on this information, the new x24 LTE Modem provides twice the download speed of its predecessors. Serge Willenegger, Senior Vice President and General Manager mentioned, “As the world’s first announced Gigabit LTE modem to achieve speeds of up to 2Gbps, the Snapdragon X24 LTE modem sets a major mobile industry milestone, designed to provide enhanced mobile broadband and deliver an extremely important gigabit coverage layer for commercial 5G networks and mobile devices that are expected to start launching in 2019." A live demonstration of the modem's capatibilities will be shown live at the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2018/02/14/qualcomm-continues-gigabit-lte-leadership-worlds-first-announced-2-gbps-lte]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2018/2/14/17009660/qualcomm-snapdragon-x24-lte-modem-2gbps-seven-carrier-aggregation-mwc]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.lowyat.net/2018/155059/new-qualcomm-x24-lte-modem-can-achieve-crazy-2gbps-download-speeds/]>>Source 3[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Chip Specifications of Intel Core i9-8950HK Leaked[/color][/b] Just recently, the important details of the Intel Core i9-8950HK's specifications have been leaked online after rumours spread through the Internet about an information leak related to one of Intel's unreleased Intel Coffee Lake processors. According to the specifications listed on benchmarking database website 3DMark, the Intel Core i9-8950K will feature a base clock speed of 2.9GHz and a maximum Turbo clock speed of around 3.9GHz. In addition, this processor will come with six cores and twelve threads. The TDP, while not stated on the 3DMark database, is expected by some news/technological analysis to be around 45W and above. Until the official specifications are released by Intel, all readers are advised to take any leaked details or rumours with a grain of salt. [i][size=x-small][url=
https://videocardz.com/75073/intel-core-i9-8950hk-spotted]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Nokia 7 Plus Phone Designs Leaked[/color][/b] Finnish mobile developer HMD Global has been caught working on a new Nokia 7 Plus based on new renders released by well-known leaker Evan Blass. HMD Global serves as the mobile arm of Nokia, where designs, productions and distributions of the mobile phones are made under Nokia's name. The specifications of the device is still yet to be released, although from further analysis of the leaked renders, it has been noted that the phone will be equipped with an 18:9 full screen display as well as a dual rear camera that was created through HMD Global's partnership with German optical manufacturer Zeiss. An interesting factor noted that made the unreleased phone catch the eyes of the money is the decision of the phone developers to use Android One as its OS instead of a Android based OS with a custom skin or several other features. Additional information from the rumors mentioned that the device is likely to be equipped with Qualcomm Snapdragon 660 as well as up to 4GB of RAM and 64GB internal storage. This phone is expected to make a debut in the Mobile World Congress 2018 in Barcelona, as new image leaks have already emerged of the phone being held by someone in a grand/stylish place. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gsmarena.com/first_nokia_7_plus_live_image_leak-news-29652.php]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.androidcentral.com/nokia-7-gets-revealed-first-hands-photo-ahead-mwc-2018]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://twitter.com/evleaks/status/963925926655545345]>>Source 3[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=https://twitter.com/evleaks/status/963925926655545345]>>Source 4[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews/Tsundere.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]New Steam Game Offers One Bitcoin To First Player Who Cracks 24 ‘Enigmas’[/color][/b] Imagine having the chance to win Bitcoin for free. Well, now you can. However, it will be a challenge that is not too easy. Montecrypto: The Bitcoin Enigma is a new game that will be coming to the Steam market on Feb. 20. Rumors report that the creators of this game have connections to the Bitcoin wallet recovery tool "btcrecover", which helps in the process of trying to recover your Bitcoin wallet if something were to ever happen with your password. The team that has worked on this game wish to stay anonymous until the day that someone is lucky enough to complete the game. The first person to have the ability to solve 24 puzzles will have the chance to win one bitcoin. On release day, the game will be on sale for 40% off and will be a cheap $1.99. The games main purpose is not to advertise the coin and raise awareness to people that they should learn more about cryptocurrency or to invest in it, but the developers believe that a fun prize for winning their game is to make money as a reward. Check out the team page [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/768750/MonteCrypto_The_Bitcoin_Enigma/]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://cointelegraph.com/news/new-steam-game-offers-one-bitcoin-to-first-player-who-cracks-24-enigmas]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]The Steam Lunar New Year Sale Has Begun[/color][/b] Happy Lunar New Year everyone! Even if this is not something you celebrate, do not feel left out as we have some gifts for you! Well, not us the HFNT, but Steam has a good selection of popular games on sale. The sale will be a short one only lasting until Feb. 19. A whopping 1,000 plus games will be available to purchase with a discount. Games like Ark: Survival Evolved, Grand Theft Auto: V and many other popular games can now be in your Steam inventory at a fraction of the price. How great is that? With a new sale comes a brand new wishlist too. The Steam Wishlist has been tweaked to help assist you and make life easier for whatever game you are looking for. You have the ability to filter out items and search for the best purchase on your wishlist. Within the wishlist will give you the option to filter your searches by pricing tiers, if the games are on a discount, or depending on the balance in your Steam wallet. Less stress is always the best when shopping! A bonus for those who are looking to purchase games will have the option to get deluxe or special editions instead of the regular versions of the games when purchasing. Of course, it depends on the game so make sure you take a look around before purchasing! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/the-steam-lunar-new-year-sale-has-begun/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Free GTA 5 Money Offered On PS4, Xbox One, And PC; Here's How To Qualify[/color][/b] Anyone who has played the Grand Theft Auto: 5 games online knows that money is the key to be successful. Do you want those flashy cars and beautiful penthouses? Well, then you are going to need to pay millions. The grind is real in GTA and people spend countless amount of hours doing heists and missions to earn a quick buck. If you like to take the easy route and sit back and relax there is always the option to pay or get into a money lobby. However, for those who like to be old school and play by the rules, you may qualify for a free $250,000 of in-game money. This offer is available for PC, Xbox, and PS4 players. Gamers who sign in now on GTA online up until Feb. 26 will have the chance to possibly win the free money. Many people can win so anyone can qualify. In addition, there is a beautiful promotion to kick off this fancy little event. Any money that you spend now up until Feb. 26, you will get a 10% refund for whatever you spent. That is great, however, the most you can earn back is only $1 million. If you have the money to blow now and think that this refund is a great deal, well there is currently a sale on offices, car properties, and a few other vehicles this week too! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/free-gta-5-money-offered-on-ps4-xbox-one-and-pc-he/1100-6456826/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/xZPlovq.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]Flip Flappers English Dub Launches on HIDIVE[/color][/b] HiDive is an anime streaming website that allows you to stream anime on popular devices like your PC, laptop, and mobile device. What makes this service different than other ones like Funimation and Crunchyroll is that the subscription fee is only $3.99. That is a great deal and as stated on their site, "cheaper than a latte". You better take this deal fast because this is only the introductory rate as the website is still pretty new. In the future, HiDive might possibly increase the price. Good news is if you purchase the $3.99 rate you will be able to keep that rate for two years after the everyday price is put into place. Much popular anime like Akame Ga Kill, Fate Series, Elfen Lied, and much more are offered on this service. Currently, the latest series added to the database is Flip Flappers English dubbed version. Similiar to airing anime, the dubbed version will be releasing one episode per week. If you have not seen this anime yet, the synopsis reads, "Cocona is a model honor student, cautious and slow to embrace new opportunities. This makes life complicated when a mysterious girl named Papika suddenly appears, fearlessly searching for a wish-granting crystal called the “Shard of Mimi.” When fates collide and they're given the ability to transform into powerful fairy-like beings, where will the dangerous journey into “Pure Illusion” take them?" The premiere of the non-dubbed version originally aired back in Oct. 2016. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-02-16/flip-flappers-english-dub-launches-on-hidive/.127901]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Senran Kagura Peach Beach Splash Launches for PC on March 7[/color][/b] What better way to spend your time than to shoot at cute, big breasted anime girls with your water gun? On March 7, Steam will be releasing the PC version of the Japanese game Senran Kagura Peach Beach Splash. Available only on PS4 at the moment, the game is a third-person shooter where you participate in a water gun tournament against female ninjas. The game has the option of single player as well as multiplayer. Gameplay provides you with hours of fun game modes and water guns that offer different abilities. The price of the game is a hefty price of $39.99 but that might be worth it for some waifu hunters out there. If you want the big breasted version, scratch that, we meant the "sexy soaker" edition of the game that will be an additional $10 and cost you $49.99. The "sexy soaker" edition includes a soundtrack, multiple costumes for characters, and special weapons with special abilities. Fanservice DLC will be sold too so if you are not only looking to blow your money on the game but to blow it on sexy costumes you are in luck! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-02-16/senran-kagura-peach-beach-splash-launches-for-pc-on-march-7/.127885]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Yuri!!! on Ice Honored at 2018 Winter Olympics![/color][/b] Representing Japan this year in the Winter Olympics, two skaters by the name of Suzuki Miu and Kihara Ryuichi performed their skating routine with a soundtrack from the very popular anime, Yuri!!! on Ice! The song that was used in the performance is the theme songs of one of the main characters in the show, Katsuki Yuri. The performance started a trend and hit-off on the popular social media website, Twitter. From there, the original creator of the anime was able to have a glimpse of what occurred and cheered on Suzaki and Kihara as thanks for their support. Is there a better way to get the attention of millions of watchers than this? Quite possibly, but this will be a great historical memory for not only Suzuki-san and Kihara-san but for the Yuri!!! on Ice series! [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5a7d66fe58edc97d171c930b/Yuri!!!-on-Ice-Honored-at-2018-Winter-Olympics!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color][/size][/font]
